enhanced_description: Employment Hero offers an all-in-one HR technology solution designed to simplify and enhance the employment experience for businesses of all sizes, especially growing ones. Launched in 2014, the platform has achieved significant global adoption, serving over 300,000 businesses and 2 million users. It provides comprehensive support across the entire employee lifecycle, from recruitment and hiring automation to HR management, compliance, and payroll. Key functionalities include automated workflows for streamlined processes like onboarding, smart payroll management, and a robust suite of built-in HR resources such as pre-built contracts, policies, and templates. The platform also integrates features for total rewards management, employee benefits, and skill development, alongside offering personalized support from dedicated HR professionals, all aimed at unlocking team potential and boosting productivity.
